project_description: A Flutter application that uses the Cubit pattern for state management to implement a counter app. The counter value multiplies by 10 every time the increment button is pressed.
architecture_overview: The project follows a modular architecture with separate folders for screens, cubits, models, and widgets. State management is handled using the Cubit pattern.

files.name: lib/main.dart
files.description: The entry point of the Flutter application. It sets up the Cubit provider and initializes the home screen.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The main entry point of the application.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the MyApp class.

files.name: lib/cubits/counter_cubit.dart
files.description: Defines the CounterCubit class which manages the state for the counter.

methods.name: increment
methods.description: Method to multiply the counter value by 10.

files.name: lib/models/counter_state.dart
files.description: Defines the CounterState class which represents the state of the counter.

methods.name: toJson
methods.description: Converts the CounterState instance to a JSON object.

methods.name: fromJson
methods.description: Creates a CounterState instance from a JSON object.

files.name: lib/screens/home_screen.dart
files.description: Defines the HomeScreen widget which is the main screen of the app.

files.name: lib/widgets/counter_display.dart
files.description: Defines the CounterDisplay widget which displays the current counter value.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the CounterDisplay.

files.name: lib/widgets/increment_button.dart
files.description: Defines the IncrementButton widget which allows the user to increment the counter value.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the IncrementButton.

widgets.name: HomeScreen
widgets.description: The main screen of the application which contains the counter display and increment button.

widgets.name: CounterDisplay
widgets.description: A widget that displays the current counter value.

widgets.name: IncrementButton
widgets.description: A button that increments the counter value when pressed.

cubits.name: CounterCubit
cubits.description: Manages the state of the counter, providing methods to update the counter value.

methods.name: increment
methods.description: Method to multiply the counter value by 10.

models.name: CounterState
models.description: Represents the state of the counter.

dependencies.name: flutter
dependencies.purpose: Flutter framework for building the app.

dependencies.name: flutter_bloc
dependencies.purpose: State management using the Cubit pattern.

dependencies.name: bloc
dependencies.purpose: State management using the Cubit pattern.

sequence_diagram:
@startuml
actor User
User -> HomeScreen: open app
HomeScreen -> CounterCubit: get initial state
HomeScreen -> CounterDisplay: display counter
User -> IncrementButton: press increment button
IncrementButton -> CounterCubit: increment
CounterCubit -> CounterState: update state
CounterCubit -> CounterDisplay: display updated counter
@enduml
state_management_flow: The state management is handled by the CounterCubit. When the user presses the increment button, the IncrementButton widget invokes the increment() method on the CounterCubit. The CounterCubit then updates the CounterState, and the updated state is reflected in the CounterDisplay widget.
navigation_flow: The app has a single screen, HomeScreen, which is displayed when the app is launched. The HomeScreen contains the CounterDisplay and IncrementButton widgets.

pubspec_yaml.name: counter_app
pubspec_yaml.description: A counter app that uses Cubit pattern to manage state.
